solution_line_template: If there are {notebooks} notebooks on the shelf, there are {pens_more_than_notebooks}+{notebooks} = <<{notebooks}+{pens_more_than_notebooks}={pens}>>{pens} pens on the shelf.
Altogether, Wesley has {pens}+{notebooks} = <<{pens}+{notebooks}={total_items}>>{total_items} notebooks and pens on the shelf.
